body_content.explanation: a point scored in baseball when you hit the ball, usually out of the playing field, and are able to run around all the bases at one time to the starting base:
examples: She opened the game with a home run.

body_content.explanation: a complete and impressive success in an activity:
examples: I think he hit a home run with his latest article; he made his point very persuasively.
By every metric that you measure our department on, we get a home run.

body_content.explanation: the last part of something that is being done:
examples: Legislation on waste is now on the home run, and it does not look good.
